***** Hindi[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * (Delhi Hindi) IPA(key): /ɡɑː/, [ɡäː]
Audio  (file)
**** Verb[edit] ****
गा • (gā)
   1. inflection of गाना (gānā):
         1. stem
         2. second-person singular present imperative
***** Nepali[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [ɡä]
    * Phonetic Devanagari: गा
**** Verb[edit] ****
गा • (gā)
   1. low-respectful second-person singular imperative of गाउनु (gāunu)

**** Etymology[edit] ****
Derived from Proto-Indo-European *gʷeh₂- (“to step”).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * (Vedic) IPA(key): /ɡɑː/
    * (Classical) IPA(key): /ɡɑː/
**** Root[edit] ****
गा • (gā)
   1. to go, go towards, come, approach
   2. to go after, pursue
